SELECT MAX(id) AS id, DATE_TRUNC('hour', measured_at) AS measuredAt, AVG(soil_moisture_value) AS soil_moisture_value FROM soil_moisture_values WHERE (measured_at)::date = CURRENT_DATE GROUP BY measuredAt ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{pagination.size} OFFSET #{pagination.skip};
